body:
PyTorch does have all the features you need for this to work as an autograd Function.

In fact, while updating my [implicit function notebook](https://github.com/t-vi/pytorch-tvmisc/blob/master/misc/Implicit_Functions_Pytorch.ipynb) and removing the obsolete claim that it doesn't work I added a few notes for making the implicit function autograd Function into a fixed point Function at the end of the worksheet.
